Description: Marl pottery vase with flat base, globular body and pulled up neck, with everted roll-over rim. Body scraped diagonally, finger marks visible at neck.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna (London, 1911), p. 19, pl. xxxviii.63a (probably misprinted in text as L36A). Marked H134a on base This pot is Late ware L60m in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
